metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8178 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Insufficient input validation in npm package `jison` <= 0.4.18 may lead to OS command injection attacks.

notes.Note: eslerm> from GHSA "This vulnerability is not present in the released npm package. Rather the vulnerable code is part of the repo, but not part of the package."

criterions.comment: node-jison: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
